questionsAndChoices.question_text: The remote work policy for this role is:

choices.choice_text: Fully remote.
All but 1-2 days a month.
3-4 days a week.
1-2 days a week.
Zero remote, 100% on-site.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: If I do not take this role, it would still be cool to hang out with at least one person I've met at this company socially.

choices.choice_text: For sure.
Not really.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: How many people work at this company?
My new-hire packet is most likely to include:

choices.choice_text: A nerf gun and a t-shirt.
A couple good professional books.
An employee handbook.
A gold-plated fountain pen.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: The techniques, technologies and skills I use in this role:

choices.choice_text: Will be totally new to me.
Will be a mix of new and stuff I know.
Wil be mostly stuff I know, with a little new.
Will be all old-hat for me.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: In this role I will be:

choices.choice_text: All hands-on doing the work.
Largely hands-on but also managing.
Mostly managing with a little hands-on.
All management and leadership.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: How many people will I be able to learn from directly, considering only people I can identify by first name?
I will have ___ direct reports in this role
When discussing how I will fit into the team:

choices.choice_text: Teammates have expressed interest in learning from me.
The team is generally excited about a new peer.
The team is excited to teach me new things.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: In this role I will be:

choices.choice_text: Calling the shots.
Taking direction.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: My progression path has been outlined:

choices.choice_text: Clearly. I know exactly how I will get promoted.
Loosely. We agree what +/- 12 months will look like.
As something that does not matter right now.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: When it comes to paid time off, this role:

choices.choice_text: Has unlimited and people use it.
Includes > 2 weeks off a year.
Includes <= 2 weeks a year, but some.
Has unlimited, but people are not able to use it.
Has none.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: The health benefits at this place are:

choices.choice_text: Outstanding - full health, dental, vision etc.
Pretty good coverage, would rate above average.
Average / just OK.
Poor, but something.
No health & wellness coverage.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: Does this role include non-standard perks like a gym membership, free lunches, snacks in the kitchen etc?

choices.choice_text: This role is pretty bare-bones as far as perks go.
There are a few extra perks but they don't really impact me.
The non-standard perks are cool and I will get use from them.
At least one of the non-standard perks has a significant impact on my life.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: If the company mission was a charitable organization, I would donate to it.

choices.choice_text: Nope.
For sure.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: Someone asks me about this role at a party:

choices.choice_text: And telling them about it makes me feel cool.
And it will likely lead to an interesting conversation.
And I summarize and look for common ground with them.
And I change the subject.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: My direct supervisor in this role:

choices.choice_text: Is still a mystery to me.
Is less than engaged with this role.
Is marginally engaged with this role.
Is supportive and invested in this role.
Is a champion for this role.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: The average number of paid time off (PTO) days taken by employees is:
The team this role belongs to tends to average:

choices.choice_text: less than 30 hours a week
30-40 hours a week
40-50 hours a week
50+ hours a week without weekends
Seemingly 24/7

questionsAndChoices.question_text: For planning and project management, team this role belongs to uses:

choices.choice_text: A project management tool that the org respects and knows how to use.
A project management tool that is generally used, but often circumvented.
Email chains, chat, and informal todo tools.
Total chaos.

questionsAndChoices.question_text: I would invest money in this company ____.

choices.choice_text: Under no circumstances.
From my "high risk" savings.
From my retirement fund.
From a loved one's retirement fund.
